ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Diamonds? (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, they can drop on any 50+ mob, including Dino in OOT from pre-expansion.  They are a little more common now with the introduction of more 50+ mobs,
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, they can drop on any 50+ mob, including Dino in OOT from
pre-expansion. They are a little more common now with the introduction of
more 50+ mobs, but still are worth quite a bit. I don't know any exact
prices, but imo you'd be selling yourself short at 2k. Then again, the
items I'm selling are always worth more than the items I'm buying and
whatever someone is willing to pay is ALWAYS the going price. :p

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony



> As they come from the planes, they're pretty much uber loot in and of
themselves. Keep in mind also that the plat/diamond combination is the
hardest to make jewelry item in the game. Thats a tough gem, sell it high
if at all.


>
> i only sold one, and i got 2k for it. my first offer was 500pp, then
next
> guy went to 750, then first guy to 1k, then 2nd guy to 2k and i sold it.
i
> would say 500-1000pp. the gems are not super rare, but the success rate
is
> extremely low.
>
> Shada
>
>
> > Anyone out there know what Diamonds sell for? Diamond jewelry pieces?
> >
> > thanks for the info!
> >
> > Kitasi Faegehearper
